author: spideysimp
description: A life sim that at the time of writing this includes a shop that rotates through items, user profiles, skills, and brand new careers! It will be updated! Please make sure your bank is set to global or it may cause issues!
install_msg: Thank you for installing Spidey Life Sim! Get started with '[p]load spideylifesim', then '[p]help SpideyLifeSim'
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data all of which are user-inputted!
